item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

as far as i would know, its a stabbingscape v3 base from I weed I. thats the person i dl’d from. but ill look that up and hope it works.

So i found it, but i dont think i can edit it out with a simple adding of the two //. heres what it shows me:

	smitimer -= 1;
	if (smitimer <= 1)
	{
		savechar();
		println_debug("Auto saved game.");
		savemoreinfo();
		println_debug("Auto saving moreinfo file...");
		if (savemoreinfo())
		{
			println_debug("Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file.");
			attempts = 0;
			smitimer = 20;
		}
		else if (!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5)
		{
			println_debug(
					"Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds");
			println_debug("Attempts: " + attempts);
			attempts += 1;
			smitimer = 5;
		}
		else if (!savemoreinfo() && attempts >= 5)
		{
			println_debug(
					"Attempts: " + attempts
					+ " - Giving up saving moreinfo file!");
			attempts += 1;
			smitimer = 99999999;
		}
	}

can i just edit out the println_debug(“Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file.”); by deleting it?

Edit2: so i did get rid of that by doing what i said above :), but now, i want to figure out how to edit ti so it dosne t tell me everytime someone types a message or command. do you know the println_debug code for that? because id rather it send to the .txt document made for them i.e. commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

I’m guessing from “[client-” + playerId + “-” playerName “]:” that you have a winterLove based server source. Which means it will probably be in “client.java”. Open it with Notepad and search for “Auto Saved Game”. Then comment it out by putting a “//” in front of the line.

Read full topic
